content: PERPLAY  is thrilled to announce a Gleam Giveaway Event!PRIZES- OG- WL (FCFS)- 5,500 $PER - 200 $USDTüëâüèª *How to Join*1. Enter through the link below.https://gleam.io/yoYIM/perplay-lets-grow-our-community-giveaway-event2. Complete all the required missions.3. Get extra entries if you do the BONUS MISSION! Event Period: 01.13.2023 - 01.23.2023 23:59 (UTC) Announcement of Winners: 01.25.2023 on PERPLAY Discord====================================================What Is Perplay?PERPLAY is the world's 1st web3 game launcher where users can add any game & earn rewards.Learn More About PerplayWebsite: https://perplay.ioMedium: https://medium.com/@PERPLAYDiscord: https://discord.gg/PERPLAY Twitter: https://twitter.com/PERPLAYofficial Facebook: https://facebook.com/PERPLAYofficial Telegram Announcement: https://t.me/PERPLAY**NOTEPERPLAY team will never ask you to send funds for this contest.
